text: William Thomas Molloy (July 27, 1940 â€“ July 2, 2019) was a Canadian lawyer and politician. He was the Chancellor of the University of Saskatchewan. He was the 22nd Lieutenant Governor of Saskatchewan from 2018 until his death in 2019. His appointment as Lieutenant Governor was made by Governor General of Canada Julie Payette. Molloy was born in Saskatoon, Saskatchewan. In May 2019, Molloy was diagnosed with pancreatic cancer. He died on July 2, 2019 from the disease in Saskatoon at the age of 78. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1940 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Canadian academics Category:Politicians from Saskatoon Category:Canadian King's Counsel
title: W. Thomas Molloy
